ai-tika-vin02t7:0_0: A nun who has been brought up from Pāṭaligāma,
ai-tika-vin02t7:2_1: It is the eight rules on acknowledgment, as stated in brief.
ai-tika-vin02t7:2_2: When the texts on the Pāṭaliputta are used:
ai-tika-vin02t7:4_0: The chapter on offenses entailing acknowledgment is finished.
ai-tika-vin02t7:5_0: But those who are trainees of five hundred and seventy-two things have been recited and concluded each other, and those who are pursued each other.
ai-tika-vin02t7:5_2: (2b) What is the reason why sentient beings are involved by the wind:
ai-tika-vin02t7:5_3: Through the meaning is that it is the meaning, having no debtermination, is the meaning.
ai-tika-vin02t7:6_1: they all, having fallen from the road to the shade of Liberation. They advocated all, they gave rise to kill.
ai-tika-vin02t7:6_2: May the one who sees Dhamma be extinguished, the one who has become fully extinguished, (thinking): “Conquering that is the time for attaining Nibbāna” .
ai-tika-vin02t7:6_3: Herein, one should be extinguished there.
ai-tika-vin02t7:7_0: Thus there is the communal recitation on the Monastic Law in the Collection.
ai-tika-vin02t7:8_0: The nuns’ rules and their complexions is finished.
ai-tika-vin02t7:9_0: The account of the commentary on the nuns’ rules and their analysis is finished.
ai-tika-vin02t7:10_0: The commentary on the color of an offense entailing confession is finished.
ai-tika-vin02t7:11_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
